marklogic.body: IMO there's LOTS of reasons to get on Haney and his book right now... but IMO these comments about 's putting isn't one of them. To borrow a phrase from one of most "infamous" posters here... Haney is "Spot on" with his comments on Tiger's putting. And of course the same comments could apply to a lot of other guys as well. You just don't win the Masters three-jacking all over the place and I might add... without making lots of those putts 10' and under.
